title: HAMBURGELY
composer: From a Gregorian ChantArr. by Lowell MasonThomas Turton
verses: When Jesus our great Master came
To teach us in his Fatherâ€™s name,
In every act, in every thought,
He lived the precepts which he taught.
So let our lips and lives express
So let our works and virtues shine,
To prove the doctrine all divine.
Thus shall we best proclaim abroad,
The honors of our Saviour, God,
And grace subdues the claim of sin.
